common.title: Welcome to the Beer Game
common.description: Experience the complexities of supply chain management in this interactive simulation.

specific.title: A supply chain Simulation Game
specific.description: This game will teach you key supply-chain concepts, by simulating a Beer distribution network.
listItems: Manage inventory levels across a multi-tier supply chain
Balance customer demand with ordering costs
Minimize total system costs through strategic decisions
Learn about the bullwhip effect in real-time
